name: Heavy Turbolaser Battery
Lore: 'The ultimate in armor penetration. Relies in dense capacitor banks for massive firing charge. Capacitors regularly malfunction. Hitting maneuverable targets nearly impossible.',
Text: 'Use 4 Force to deploy in your Star Destroyer (adds 2 to power) or any mobile system. May target a starship using 2 Force. Draw two destiny. Subtract 1 when targeting a capital starship. Otherwise, subtract 6. Target hit if total destiny > defense value.',
